title: Textile, 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton 
Technique: warp faced plain weave
provenance: Collected by donor in Nigeria in 1973.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 43.2 x 10.8 cm (17 x 4 1/4 in.)
description: A narrow-woven strip with a red ground and a green stripe in the center, flanked on both sides by a narrow ikat stripe of dark and light blue, of a type called "alari." The warp is of red Tussah silk, green cotton, and indigo ikat cotton, and the weft is on black cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 20th century.
20th century. Medium: silk, cotton 
Technique: warp faced plain weave. Gift of Dr. Mattiebelle Gittinger. 1973-65-2.
